name: ZYNERBA PHARMACEUTICALS, INC.
sampleDescriptions: Assist in the development & approval process before the FDA of Zynerba's lead therapeutic for the potential treatment of behavioral symptoms associated with Fragile X Syndrome.

Brief key House & Senate Members and/or appropriate staff on need and justification for this product. Secure letter of support for applications from key House & Senate Members.
